Question: Comments:
This is my favorite class that I have taken at Kettering.
My favorite class this term. I truly enjoyed having that creative freedom for our line.
I really enjoyed the class. It forces students to critically think and utilize all topics that are introduced.

Teamwork and creativity

Question: Comments:
Some students just select strongly agree and hit submit. This is not one of those cases, rather simply the right answer.
I love taking classes with Dr. Maier. He is in my opinion the best professor in the IME department.
Dr. Maier is a great professor who puts time and effort into his lessons. He creates an environment where learning new topics is hands on and engaging. I enjoyed having him as a professor
